name: Cherena Dukes
text: Nice homes in fairly new subdivisions.

name: Lee Morrison
text: Roads are terrible.  Neighbors park in yards. Certain teen causes issues at pool.

name: j p
text: New Subdivision  with brand new houses and some that have been around for several years.

name: Cherena Dukes
text: Nice homes in fairly new subdivisions.

name: Lee Morrison
text: Roads are terrible.  Neighbors park in yards. Certain teen causes issues at pool.

name: j p
text: New Subdivision  with brand new houses and some that have been around for several years.

name: Cherena Dukes
text: Nice homes in fairly new subdivisions.

name: Lee Morrison
text: Roads are terrible.  Neighbors park in yards. Certain teen causes issues at pool.

name: j p
text: New Subdivision  with brand new houses and some that have been around for several years.

name: Cherena Dukes
text: Nice homes in fairly new subdivisions.

name: Lee Morrison
text: Roads are terrible.  Neighbors park in yards. Certain teen causes issues at pool.

name: j p
text: New Subdivision  with brand new houses and some that have been around for several years.

name: Luke Krause
text: More than just a golf course. They help the community immensely. 5 stand sporting clays, golf, restaurant, driving range, fishing & a great place to stay at the guest condo's.

name: Joey Courseault
text: Absolutely awesome

name: william carlton
text: Great

name: Kayte Randall
text: My family and I had a most relaxing weekend celebrating my birthday.  There was something to do at all times.  We will be back!

name: Whisper Gray
text: Gorgeous!

name: Douglas Jones
text: We stopped in for a two night stay on our way to Florida.  Unbeatable hospitality, complete with food, drinks, and fun on the lake. We will definitely be back!

name: Shirley Beasley
text: Love the staff

name: David Mauffray
text: Great stay at a very nice location. Amenities are excellent. Management was extremely accommodating when we had a medical situation develop. Highly recommend. Cafe Acadiana a few miles East has great food.

name: Robert Richsrdson
text: Definitely not a resort, just a place to park your motor coach, and pay a ridiculous price for a very small cottage in which you would build a home for the same price. Nothing to do there, you have to drive miles for anything to do

name: Penny Champagne
text: Awesome new motorcoach resort in south Alabama.  Smaller than some resorts which gives it a more friendly feeling.   Well maintained grounds, clubhouse and pool. Close enough to beautiful Fairhope with a variety of shops, outlet mall, restaurants and golfing.  The gulf coast is just a short drive away.   Always enjoy our stay.

name: Scott Chandler
text:
We were on site 38.  The clubhouse and common areas were top notch!!!  Grounds were well maintained.  There is a bit of construction for phase II but it should be completed by the time you read this review.  No pressure to buy a lot but they are a great value being 10 min to Fairhope and 25+/- to the beach at Gulf Shores.
If you are passing thru, it's worth it!  5⭐

name: Robert Mims
text: Beautiful. Quiet. Gated. Great staff and facilities. Can't wait to go back. First Class in every way.

name: Connie Tracy
text: What a lovely place. Very quiet, serene, and friendly. The hosts were helpful and even showed us a coach house. Beautiful spot for snowbirds.

name: captinair head
text: The best Motor Coach Resort I've been. Pool is well maintained as well as the groundworks and other amenities. Well done Pat!!

name: Al Wheeler
text: This is a first class resort. It has a beautiful pool and club house. Management is great and care about all of the details large and small. We will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you for the visit and the kind words. We love seeing happy guests and want to make every stay memorable. See you soon!

name: Perry Jerkins
text: Very nice place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Mr. Jerkins! We hope to see you soon!

name: dan peek
text: See

resp.text: Thanks for the visit! Come see us soon!

name: Enrique Carias
text:
(Translated by Google) Nice and cozy place

(Original)
Lugar agradable y acogedor

name: Guardian ZX9
text: Very Nice, yes, luxury not just yet, not even trash pickup service, Super huge pull through pads, great hookup setup, 2 pools, one is very small. Main pool only open until 7pm. Only a handful of amenities. But the location is awesome Everything is near. For full luxury see Carolina Pines RV Resort, true luxury RV Resort, it really reset the bar for us.

name: LaDonna Klein
text: This was our 1st long distance RV trip. We couldn't have asked for a better place.The staff was so friendly and helpful. The entire resort was extremely clean and very quiet. It is close to everything from the beach, grocery and boat rental across the street. We had such a good time that we extended our stay. We will definitely be back.

name: Melanie West
text:
This was our second time staying at Pandion.  We could not get the military discount that they advertised for our entire stay so I wrote directly to Sun resorts and have yet to resolve anything.
We were amazed how things had changed and amenities had decreased while pricing increased.  The pools with maintenance closed at 7pm as the adult pool only had seating for 5.
The trash was overflowing the majority of time we were there.  The old rules were all posted but no one there to enforce them.  The expansion was in full force as large dump trucks sped through the park.  Again for the price you pay, we do not recommend and will not return!!

name: Tim Shallenberger
text: Great place to stay! Super clean bathrooms and the pools are great. We would come back again and probably end up staying longer

name: Houston Colbert
text: It was good until i received E mail about bike trail closing they could have sent it before we got here

name: Mark Treas
text:
Great facilities.
Large spaces for our 40 foot coach plus tow vehicle.

Pool closed at 7pm - which was very disappointing for my wife and me and especially for our kids.

It’s not a cheap stay, but if the pool hours were better, I’d give it 5 stars.

name: Kathy-Don Elmore
text:
Stopped here on our tour of local RV resorts.
As we had been driving a bit we asked to use facilities prior to touring the location.
However we were denied access because they were restricted to registered guests do to Covid??
Really one year later and this is how we do things?
Needless to say, we didn't bother looking this place over based on this experience.
I'm sure we can find someplace more welcoming willing to take our money and perhaps allow an "old man " a potty break!

name: David Hake
text: Stayed 1 month in Jan 2021 and loved it.  Back in spot was plenty long for our 38 ft 5th wheel and our ram 3500 dually.  Clean, convenient and the staff was very friendly.  Will stay again.

name: shannon suarez
text: I don’t even know where to start. This place is so beautiful. The bathrooms, sites, pool area, and clubhouse are pristine. They are efficiently run and have super friendly staff. They make us feel like family. Deborah is top notch and goes above and beyond!  She had several lines going at once, as people were cancelling reservations, making reservations and dealing with an uncertain time with the virus.  Melanie and Lynn are sweethearts too.   They really run a flawless operation. We never even see a line when multiple rigs check in. I sure hope this company values their staff and compensates them well. Anyone can be replaced, but it definitely wouldn’t be the same. Hang onto this crew!  We love Pandion Ridge and more importantly its people!

name: William Ealy
text: This is a great RV park. It is clean and beautiful. It really loved up to the resort standard. The very best thing about it though, the ladies in the office give it a family feel. We spend our winters here.

name: Robert Nilsson
text: The best place I've ever stayed at.  Spacious sites, friendly staff, great amenities. Great  hiking and biking immediately adjacent to the park.  Gulf State park backs up against RV park.  Beach and free parking is all of 10 minutes away in heavy traffic.

name: Randy Knowles
text: Very clean ( rather new) great place to camp.

name: Garry MacPherson
text: Beautiful RV Resort , large sites , well laid out , easy access , staff friendly & accomodating. Highly recommend this park, we will be back ..

name: John Belbeck
text:
We have been on the road for 7 weeks, travelling LA to Florida and this RV Park is a stand out, on facilities and price. Super friendly staff and fabulous surrounds and access onto 25 plus miles of state park trails.
Excellent amenities, does feel like a resort.
Would rate as 6 stars if possible.

Highly recommend

name: mandy clark
text: This is our second year to visit for spring break. It is a family vacation spot for us. We love the spot and this rv resort is so very nice. The bathrooms are always clean and the showers are spacious. Beautiful pool area and hot tub with fire pit beside it. Out in another area they have a adult heated pool too. Our dog loves their dog park and they have two. We have our reservation for next year but very disappointed we couldn’t get a lake site and make this a year out.

name: Joann Wainscott
text: This is an absolutely awesome RV Resort.  Spacious sites, very big rig friendly!  We travel in a 45’ Newell quad slide with a Jeep toad and still had lots of room on our site.  They have thought of every possible luxury need for their guests!  We put this place on our “must stay” list! Fabulous!!

name: Sir Charles
text: Wow what can i say the place was very very did i say very clean.... the pools, the grounds, the staff, and the location to town, and beaches it was priceless im.planning on returning at least once a year. Thanks!

name: Mitzi Evans
text: Lovely ans quite..love our stay

name: Kacy Davis
text: Neighborhood is friendly. Park is pet friendly. Plenty of space to relax. Enjoyable vacation here!!! Two pools. It's across from the Wharf!!!

name: Lynn Lessmiller
text: Nice facility however,  people kept walking thru our site!! My husband called the office twice but it didn't seem to matter to anyone.  For $89 per night in a so-called "premium lakeside spot" it was NOT worth the hype or my HUSBAND'S frustrations.

name: Laurel Schaap
text: Very nice place for large RVs.  Wish the community room had been available for us to use in the evening.

name: Ashley M
text: So much space for each lot, very clean, and super friendly staff! Kudos. Can't wait to stay again!

name: Becky Macks
text: It's a great place,  just with it had a playground for the smaller kids.

name: Darrell Turner
text: Each stay is perfect. We are already thinking about returning.

name: Michael Dewey
text: Very nice place to stay.  Minutes from the beach.  Huge lots, level cement parking spots for RV and vehicles, and very kept up!

name: Heather McCreary
text: Great free WiFi! Awesome range

name: Kerry Johnson
text: Friends stay here. 1st class place

name: Janet Anderson
text: Excellent RV experience so far. Love it.

name: Ryan Hines
text: Awesome!!!! Had a small gym and pool/hot tub as well

name: Hunter
text: Was okay. Nothing special except hot tub and pool. For the price I beleive next time I'll just rent a room 5 miles from the shore.

name: Chris Carter
text: Beautiful clean friendly

name: J Hughes
text: Truly a must experience

name: Monqrea Morris Sr.
text: Super

name: Raymond Trehern
text: Great place

name: RA 46
text: Great people. Terrific space to rent for just about any small to medium sized function. Tremendous in the community.

name: Dean Shepherd
text: Great folks, very friendly.  An active lodge.

name: Ronald c “Carl” Heffner
text:
(Translated by Google) Rad

(Original)
Rad

name: Mac Murphy
text: One of our favorite places to stay! This unit has EVERYTHING anyone would need. Clean and updated! We have two children that are 8 and 4. It is the PERFECT spot for them. About 3 steps off the balcony and you are IN the pool. Owners were so accommodating. Would def. recommend to ANYONE!

resp.text: Thanks Mac. Happy to hear you and the family enjoyed your stay. Looking forward to your return.

name: Brandy Rivers
text: Is this for rent or the garage by the school

resp.text: This is a condo complex on Dauphin Island adjacent to the Holiday Isle condos on Bienville Blvd. Right on the beach with two large outdoor pools (one seasonally heated), beautiful landscaped courtyard around the pools with a large gazebo and charcoal grills.

name: brenda jordan
text: Good food, polite,friendly staff,beautiful and well kept.

name: Ginny Phillips Allen
text: Beauty of nature and the finesse of comfortable living nestled in a natural setting.

name: Will Shiver
text: Beautiful!

name: Alan Buskirk
text: Top notch! Beautiful resort. Golf course is in great shape!

name: Wade Hadley
text: The golf course here is AWESOME . Clean and very well maintained . The turf is like a vacuumed green carpet .

name: K. Allen Foster
text: Beautiful, stately, classy - what an incredible facility!

name: Jesse Hollingsworth
text: Very pretty course with great scenery. The greens here are some of the toughest greens I have ever experienced. If you are up for a challenge, this is a neat course to play.

name: Kim Melton
text: We had my niece's baby shower at Cumberland today and it was super nice. The place has amazing views and Veronica runs the place top notch!

name: r b
text: My first time there and I was impressed..Veronica is a very good manager...she is on top of the flow of players..

name: Brian Tolzman
text: Veronica was great!  The course was in rough shape. They did have bad weather however don't think that affected the conditions though.

resp.text: Not a correct assessment.  Condition and layout, one of the best in the area at this price point.

name: jullie hallman
text: Beautiful

name: Tangy Bodie
text: My husband and 3 others drive over 1 hr to play this course. When they got there a lady was working the club house. They informed her that they had reserved a tee time at 12:30. She was soooo nasty to them. She threw her hand up to cut them off and informed them that there were no carts available for 30-40 mins. The guys were ok with this since they would hit the driving range up in the meantime. It was her holier than thou attitude that made them mad. The owner was contacted and he defended her saying she sometimes comes off as rude, he did however go speak to the men and offered them a Gatorade as compensation... Yes will deff not be back! But they did say the course was nice.

resp.text: The real story of this review is that Tangy Bodie whatever her name may be, wasn't even at the golf course.   This is more of a story of how she can attempt to extract extreme compensation for the threat of a bad review.  From the moment speaking with Alexis on the phone the conversation quickly became "what kind of compensation will you give me??"  Meaning she wanted me to refund over $ 160.00 in greens fees because of her threats of a poor review.   I went out to the course and spoke to the gentlemen about the incident.  They were delayed only 5 minutes from their tee time.  My worker could have had a cooler head dealing with customers, but an apology was made and the men appeared to be happy that I looked into the situation. I offered to buy them a round of beers as a friendly gesture.   I am more than willing to accept a one star review than cower to a person trying to extort money in lieu of a bad review.   Cumberland Lake GC is one of the finest golf courses in Birmingham at its price point.  And, we also have some very fine individuals working behind the counter.  Please judge for yourself.

name: Mike Hamner
text: Really nice course, fairways and greens were very playable, challenging layout. Will definitely want to play it again.

name: Michael Dennis
text: Love it such a nice place to hang out and supper friendly  staff!!!

name: Jackie Aronhalt
text: My husband golfed 2 rounds here and loved it! I enjoyed the huge (amazingly clean) pool, food, drinks and view. Awesome!

name: Daniel Banks
text: Great little course. Played it while in Birmingham on business. Greens were a little slow, but rolled smooth. Fantastic layout. Will play again next time in town.

name: Jane Aronhalt
text: New ownership has made amazing turn around. Beautiful course. Love the views. Looking forward to booking a group event.

name: David SMith
text: Course is looking really good! They seem to be making a lot of improvements. Best deal in town at $23 on Tuesdays!

name: Brandon Shirah
text: Love the layout. Course was bought by a group of people and since then they have let the course go a little bit. New new groundskeeper to take pride in the course.

name: Homer Marlowe
text: By far in the best shape it has ever been in thanks to a  new grounds keeper  sent from heaven an new managers that are looking out for the members a great place to jone

name: Parker Cantrell
text: 19th hole has some of the sweetest people around. Worth the trip

name: Lavador Sizemore
text: Beautiful golf course, i worked at this golf course back in 1996 and 97 alot of good memories!

name: Terry Crane
text: Greens are fast. Course in good shape

name: Byron Dixon
text: Very friendly staff. Great rates.

name: Harrison Jones
text: Nice place.

name: Leslie Cheatham
text: Beautiful and serene spot! I spent the weekend at the Honeywood Valley lodge with a group of friends from college and it could not have been more perfect for us! We hope to make this a yearly get together. We had plenty of space to relax and catch up outside and inside, when it rained. I highly recommend it for your next event!

resp.text: We are so happy you choose to spend your girls getaway at Honeywood Valley. We loved having you and look forward to being an annual retreat you and your friends!

name: Megan LaRussa Chenoweth
text: We had a wonderful weekend at Honeywood! It was such an easy, quick drive from Birmingham but when you get to the property you feel so much farther away as it's so peaceful! We loved just relaxing & enjoying the beautiful scenery.  And we couldn't resist getting some spa treatments from the ladies of Fancy Face. It was amazing, they came to the property for the spa treatments so we didn't have to go anywhere! All in all it was a truly relaxing & rejuvenating weekend & we can't wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to spend your time at Honeywood Valley. We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful time and look forward to having you back anytime.

name: True40 Downtown Birmingham
text: We took a staff wellness retreat at Honeywood, and it was beyond incredible. The property and house are so beautiful, that you can be completely happy just sitting and relaxing for the duration of the stay, but Honeywood provides so many activities and amenities. We took a barre class in the barn, yoga on the deck, and enjoyed water activities like paddle boarding, canoeing, and kayaking. We spent sunset with wine watching the sunset on the expansive deck. There was plenty of space to sleep comfortably and privately. Honeywood would be an ideal venue for a number of different trips: a girls weekend, family getaway, corporate retreat, wedding, and more. You can make Honeywood your own while you're there, and we were so impressed.

resp.text: We are so happy to share this slice of heaven with you! It gives us such joy that you all were able to relax, retreat and spend time with your team growing, sweating and being in fellowship together. We are extremely thankful and grateful that you all enjoyed your stay with us at Honeywood!

name: Lynda Ratliff
text: Honeywood Valley is such a serene and peaceful place to go, unwind and truly rejuvenate. The accommodations are very well appointed with gorgeous rooms, plenty of space and everything you need for a true retreat.

resp.text: Lynda, thank you so much for your feedback. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

name: Zach Plunket
text: Amazing venue and great people. The entire property is well kept, managed and beautiful. Didn’t account for how far away it would be from any gas stations and I ran out of gas. One of the owners brought out a personal gas can and put 5 gallons in my vehicle.

resp.text: We were glad to have you! Hate to hear you ran out of gas, but we are happy to hear our team was there to assist when needed. Come back and see us again soon!

name: Allie Tittle
text: Hands down the most beautiful wedding venue I’ve ever been to! The views were incredible, the management and staff were extremely friendly, and the property was immaculate. 10/10!

resp.text: Thank you for your amazing review! We hope you come back to see us again soon!

name: Gaynell Tate
text: It was one of the most peaceful places I ever experienced

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that! We hope you come back to see us again soon!

name: Brandon Broach
text:
Yellow Branch is an amazing place. We’ve visited before for weddings and also come corporate events and every time it takes my breath away.  The owners are so gracious in sharing this little piece of heaven with others.

Watching the sunset from the deck or balcony over the lake just feeds my soul.

The hilltop barn is a refuge within a refuge. It’s a great place for reflection and quiet.

It truly is a gem in the Alabama hills.

name: Stephanie Brumbeloe
text: If you are looking for a unique wedding venue at a place that everyone will be excited about getting an invitation to, then Yellow Branch is the place for you. Just one wedding per weekend and you have the place all to yourself. An experience you and your guests will never forget! It's worth every penny!

name: Gina McGiboney
text: Gorgeous scenery and hospitable owners!  Wonderful location for weddings, family reunions,  or business retreats!

name: Thomas Nails
text: Beautiful place, wonderful staff. Very vendor friendly.

name: Suanne Nutter
text: Beautiful venue and nice people.

name: Michael Sides
text: Beautiful property, gorgeous house, better views.

name: Robert Frazier
text: Beautiful location

name: Ray Johnson
text: Good

name: Debra Mays
text: Time Away RV Resort is awesome. Currently still under construction with a complete hospitable atmosphere.  Anticipating the continuing construction of all the phases.  This place is a great asset to the community at large and should foster other economic growth in Talladega County.  Much more  success!!

resp.text: Thank you for all that you do! We appreciate you! Time Away RV Resort!

name: Queen's Escapades
text:
This RV park is close to the race track. The owners are very friendly and make great host. The park has gravel sites at this time,  a playground and dog walk.   They had a BBQ booth the weekend of the April race and the food was really good. The pool is under construction and will be a big plus once complete!  We look forward to seeing their continued progress.  Reason for 4 stars... Although all the sites are pull through, they are not at an angle,  making for a very sharp turn to get into sites which can be difficult for some Big Rigs like ours, and the sites are very close to each other.  We spent most of our time at the race so these items were not an issue for us.  We will definitely stay here again.

The Queen's Carriage  - Jr & Sharron

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Ty Hill
text: Nate and Alicia have done a great job with this premium RV park. We had a great time camping last weekend and really enjoyed the entertainment and all of the people we met. The pull through camp sites make it easy and convenient to setup quickly.

resp.text: Thank you! We can't wait to finish Phase 1! Time Away RV Resort!

name: Janelle Sprowls
text: We stayed for their very first weekend during their grand opening. I had followed their story since the place was a field and was excited to see the progress, was not disappointed, it is a very nice place. The owners will go out of their way to make you feel welcome and your stay pleasant. We are founding members and will be back!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Bruce Williams
text: This place is really coming along. They're working hard for the grand opening. Alicia and her husband gets an A++++. You have to make this one of your stops even if it's a little out the way.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Don Williams
text:
Enjoyed our visit.  The owners were super friendly and very helpful.  They are still making improvements to the property.   It promises to be a very nice campground. It is close to the racetrack and has full hookup.  I would highly recommend it to anyone staying in the area.

Don and Bonnie,  Grenada, MS

resp.text: Thank you!

name: J.C. Foster
text: Up and coming RV park. Great host looking forward to our next trip there.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Melissa Robbins
text: Highly recommend! Full hookups (water pressure is great)! The campground owners were very helpful and gracious. This will be a great get away once they complete the campground. Cannot wait to see it later this yr.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Scott Carpenter
text: Had a wonderful time even with a full day of rain. Will definitely be going back and the 12 hour drive won't stop me

resp.text: Hi Scott! Thanks so much for visiting! We are looking forward to your next visit! Thanks, Time Away RV Resort

name: Andrew Haney
text: Nate and Alicia Lawson have created a little slice of heaven at Time Away. It has been a true blessing to be involved with these wonderful down to earth people. Growing up in the area I know firsthand that Talladega and the surrounding communities have longed for such a place. I'm so excited to see what the future has in store for us all. Keep on keepin on!

resp.text: We are so excited to meet you and your work has been Awesome! Thanks!

name: Laron Perry
text: It was very clean spacious also having  basketball court and other activities for everyone age group and the staff was simply Great and kind I would definitely recommend this Rv resort

resp.text: Thanks Laron!

name: Charles Oldham
text: Ok people it's growing near. What am I talking about? The Grand Opening of Time Away RV Resort in Lincoln, Alabama. This is an event that you don't wanna miss. It's going to be epic. The owners have done a great job of creating something very special. To think that the owners actually gave us RV camping folks a chance to give our input in the making of something so great , is absolutely amazing and shows how much they want their Resort to be one of a kind. If you miss this Grand opening, you will truely miss something spectacular! Thanks to the owners Nathan and Alicia Lawson for all of their hard work , creating a place that we all can take pride in and enjoy.  Thank you much.

resp.text: This should make everyone excited to join us! We am looking forward to meeting you and your family! Thank you so much!

name: Pam Johnston
text: Owners was very friendly.  To be a new full hookup Rv Campground close to the Race Track  is wonderful cant wait to stay again. If you get a chance go check them out.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Marlon Moss
text:
I have to say that it was awesome finally meeting the owners during our stay.  Really proud of them and to see the great work and progress with the continued construction.
The location of the resort was excellent - not far from the Interstate, and a relatively short drive to stores (i.e. Walmart, etc.).
Have been to quite a few RV resorts and honestly some good takeaways and some not so good experiences.  My ONLY criticism was it seemed the sites were a little close to each other, however, the owners made accommodations and created some good spacing for those of us that were reserved in some of the smaller sites.  I also believe that I overheard that the owners were looking to make some improvements as they continue to complete the overall construction.
But again, really inspiring to see this all come together in the way that it is and I will DEFINITELY be back in June for the Grand Opening.
#GreatTimes #GreatOwners #GreatStory2Tell #LastingFriendships #Inspiring #TimeAway

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Mr. E
text: I visited this place and I can not wait to go back. Quiet and no BS there.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: John Cotton
text:
Very new and a work in progress by a couple pouring their heart and sweat in building this RV Resort.
It is a great location to the Talladega Motor Raceway.

resp.text: Thank you John! It’s been a pleasure having you here and we are looking forward to seeing you again! Thanks

name: Jake Wells
text: Super nice owners! Made our stay very pleasant!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Scott Nemecheck
text: Great new resort! Well done.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Carlene Duran
text: It has been fun to watch the construction process of Time Away RV Resort excited for them and can hardly wait for our trip in June!

resp.text: Thanks Carlene! See you soon!

name: Pastor Carmeka T. Benning
text: The owners are kind and professional. They have managed to bring back that community togetherness vibe that existed in the 60's, &70's... trailblazers!

resp.text: Spot on! We are all in this together! Thanks and see you soon!

name: Arlinda Self
text:
This is such an amazing idea and business concept! Thank you for taking us along for your journey and showing us the full process!

You are truly a marriage and partnership!
Keep it going! Can’t wait to come for the Grand Opening June 2021!!

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for being a part of our journey, Your suggestions happen appreciated! We are looking forward to seeing you at the 2021 Grand Opening Celebration! Thank You! Time Away TV Resort

name: Doris Merriweather
text:
The Owner's of this Resort are wonderful people to have in your life.  You will definitely be pleased at doing business with them.

I can’t wait until the Grand Opening!!!
Congratulations!! God Bless!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Affordable Septic LLC
text: These are some amazing people. We had the pleasure of doing some work for them and I tell u what u have never met people so nice. If y'all need a place to camp they are definitely who u wanna call.

resp.text: Thank you! We are looking forward working with you again in the future! Great work!

name: Lisa B.
text: Very excited to attend the Grand Opening of Time Away RV resort!!  Can’t wait to meet Nate and Alicia, can’t wait to meet other campers, can’t wait for good times and making memories!!

resp.text: We are going to have so much fun! So many interesting bands and singers - so excited to meet you and your family! Thank you so much!

name: James Chavis
text: Lake Erie Travelers will be coming to Time Away Resort in June!  We are excited!

resp.text: So excited and looking forward to seeing you and your family! Thanks

name: Harper Bazaar
text: Volunteers Debra and her husband Nate (not the owner) were VERY kind to us. Aside from our encounters with them and two other campers, we did not enjoy our time there.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing however we did not find a reservation or visit from you in our records. You may book at 205-855-3033 or www.timeawayrvresort.com. Hope to see you soon! Time Away RV Resort!

name: Say ASMRtist
text: This will be the best RV resort in Talladega come June

resp.text: Thank you! See you soon!

name: Dynvar Lachelle
text:
We are so excited about your Grand Opening!!!! Can’t
Wait!

resp.text: Thank you! Looking forward to seeing you and your family!

name: Shirley Lawson
text: I can’t wait for the grand opening!

resp.text: Looking forward to seeing you! Thank you!

name: Robbie Malone
text: Pass by it everyday, looks like somebody's house.

name: Kymberly Smith
text: I absolutely love this beautiful hidden gem. So much that I may never leave. The views are stunning. Access to the water couldn't be more convenient or easier. It's owned and operated by a family, four generations of who call it home. It's much more like a community than an RV park. You have to see it to truly appreciate it. The cherry on top, the price is beyond reasonable and less than most places I've stayed.

name: Charlie Webster
text: Good fishing but I wouldn't eat any

name: Charlie Webster
text: I have always loved Mallard Creek!! I haven't been since they supposedly fixed the place up really well

name: Deanna Journey
text: Jimmy and Mike are such wonderful folks. They express the most welcoming feeling. Very peaceful and relaxing.

name: Jamie Contreras
text: Buy your boaters pass here every year easy water access friendly staff

name: Michael Rigsby
text: Quite place to camp and fish with a private dock for the camp ground residents.

name: Lisa Lynn Terry
text: We love it here it is very nice and quiet and safe.  And has a very nice view of the river.  The people here are friendly.

name: Donald Steele
text: Great campground! Jimmy and Michael are the best.

name: David Goddard
text: Beer is cold and fishing is great

name: Jasmin Tice
text: Has awesome views, and good fishing spots. Also has a lot of camping spots!

name: Ricky Brenner
text: Great people good fishing

name: K h
text: Nice area to relax and fish

name: Patsy Williams
text: Very peaceful and a beautiful place to enjoy nature !!!

name: Michael Keffer
text: Great place to go!

name: Carson Wedel
text: Good work option

name: Barry Johnson
text: Great people, beautiful scenery!!!

name: Phillip Edwards
text: Peace of mind

name: Marie Stewart
text: Loved it

name: Patsy Williams
text: Very peaceful and a beautiful place to enjoy nature !!!

name: Carol N Garren
text: Because I live there

name: Marquita Holt
text: Awesome

name: Jessica Abbott
text:
My husband and I love boarding our dogs here. One of our dogs got sick one night he was there and the owners spoon fed him some soft food. The next morning, they went back to the dogs an hour earlier to make sure he was okay. I am so grateful for the special care they gave that day. It won me over. I will always take our dogs to them because I trust them!
Also, if you take your dogs here for daycare or boarding, watch their Facebook page (Maddy's Pet Resort) for daily pictures of your pups! ❤️

name: David Mcdonald
text: She informed me without meeting my GSD that it would not do good in her boarding.

name: Michael Estrada
text:
We love this place as much, if not more,  as our dog does.  It's like dropping him off at his "grandparents" and knowing they love him as much as we do.  Love the Facebook picture updates, too!  A nice touch and a great way to see our boy is having fun every day.
Highly recommended !!!

resp.text: Thank you, so much. Sultan entertains us as much as we do him. He is hilarious to watch and play with.

name: Tammie Stroud
text: I have boarded our dogs there twice in the last few years. They are very friendly and helpful and you can tell they care. When we had to leave them longer than a day they posted pictures of them on their Facebook page and we LOVED seeing them. We love our vet and have boarded them there however, Maddys IS a little resort for them and they have the freedom to go potty and they play with the other dogs. We always take our dogs when we can but if we HAVE to leave them we will always choose Maddy's.

name: Louisa DiLeone
text: We've been boarding our small dog at Maddy's for years and have been extremely happy with the care she has received. The owners are awesome, personable people who clearly love their customers and their dogs! One time, Maddy's was booked (we waited until the last minute to call) and we had to take our dog to another local boarding facility. It was nothing like Maddy's and I worried about her the entire time. I would cancel a trip before boarding her anywhere else in the future. Love this place!

name: Jeremy Black
text: Best place in north Alabama to watch your pets. The owners are the most kind people we have met since we moved here, they treat every client's animals like their own. They are great at accommodating all my needs and never once have I worried when I dropped my dogs off for daycare or boarding if my animals needs were not being looked after.

name: Beth Fiorucci
text: Just started taking my puppy, Duke, to Maddy's.  He loves it! Love seeing the pictures they post daily on their Facebook page.

name: Justin Draughon
text: I love Maddy's! This is a great place for daycare and boarding. They treat our dogs like family!

name: Zebulon L
text: Barb and Mike are both awesome and take care of our Bruce Wayne as if he is their own.  Highly recommended!

name: Ruby Winkles
text: Very expensive but suggest you use there doggie daycare

resp.text: I would invite you, a person who has NEVER USED OUR BUSINESS, to call around and price places that offer as much outside play time as we do. Our guests get 6 to 7 hours of out of the room group playtime 4 days a week and up to 12 hours of group play time on daycare days, 3 days a week. Please get back with us when you find another. We are very competitively priced for boarding. One star rating based on one uninformed factor and opinion is unfair, rude and hurtful.

name: Gray Wells
text:
LOVE!
We have been using Maddy's for years- since they started, maybe 10 years ago!
We love the attention our dogs get, Barbara's sense of humor, and the entire operation.

name: Bama Bryant
text: We board our dogs 2-3 times a year for vacations or out of town matters. We usually board with 1 or 2 other places within the area. Decided to call & check prices at Maddy's to compare. We were told the whole spill about what our pets would get & how they'd be treated. It sounded decent until we told them we had 2 Dachshund & a Pitbull, then asked prices. The conversation quickly changed to "oh sorry we don't board those kinda dogs". Those kind of dogs we asked? "Yes Pitbulls" they replied. Instant red flag for me.  How are you gonna stereotype one breed of dog? A dog you've never met. A dog that lives with my 2yr old Son, 3yr old daughter & 2 wiener dogs inside. 2 potbelly pigs & about 30 chickens outside. Who goes to the dog park & has played with many other strange dogs. Who has been boarded atleast 25+ times in his 9yrs of age with no issues. My dogs are like my kids & for someone or someplace to stereotype or judge them on "Their Breed" is outrageous to me! I will never use your business & I will never refer anyone to your business either. Wish I could rate you zero stars! 1 star is to much for your business ranking in my opinion.

name: Linda Pickard
text:
I love Maddys.
It's an awesome place to have your pet.
The owners are all about the care of your furbabies.

name: Tami W
text: My dog looooves Maddy's and so do we. They play with him constantly and Maddy's offers the best value by far.

name: Tim Dalton
text: Great people who take great care of your pets!

name: Jeff Armstead
text: My dogs love it.

name: Susan Caldwell
text: Barb and Mike are the best!

name: Buddy Wachter
text: Very nice people

name: Mora Johnson
text: Love this place!

name: Bri3w 16
text: Awesome place! Relaxing country environments. ..and a great auto shop located behind it...fixed my car during my stay...left refreshed and road ready with no worries

name: Jesse James
text: Excellent place to get away at and forget your troubles

name: Renee Scott
text: Love it

name: Kevin Carwile
text: Lots to do and see.

name: Yolandrea Currie
text: Loving it and enjoying it with Family and friends

name: neal
text: Great place for kids

name: Gina Dloniak
text: Love family vacationing here. Never a dull moment with the lazy river, slides, pools, putt putt golf area, playground, and amazing place to eat on site!!

name: Brittany Gonzalez
text: We went last night, and loved it!! The live music was great, and the sno balls were delicious! 😊 Great atmosphere!!

name: Jessica Pinon
text: This place was a great family spot. Good food and great music.

name: Willie Croy
text: Drinks mixed way to strong. Sent the first back the second was just as bad but we didn't complain again on that. Burgers had good flavor but were burnt to a crisp on the outside. Appetizer and wings were decent but a hundred dollar bill for long John silver quality food is definitely ridiculous. For the money spent we expected top notch. Disappointing is an understatement.

name: Jade W
text: We really enjoy this place. It's only around during the summer. The shaved ice trailer is awesome and the panini press trailer is good too. Free to come hang out.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us at The Village Lawn. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit. We hope you visit again soon.

name: Chelsea Weber
text: Cute place to visit,  it's only open from 6-10 in the evenings though... Food trucks (decent but not great), ice cream, and live entertainment- the kids loved it!

name: Brenda Lopez
text: Great place to bring family. We had a group of 44 kids and adults for my church group amazing place

name: Leslie Lenney
text: Great place to hang out and let the kids have fun.  I was hoping to purchase a Village Lawn shirt. Is there anywhere I could get one of these?

resp.text: We don't have Village Lawn shirts but that's a good idea. I'll check into that - Geoff Walker

name: Donna Davis
text: Spent way too much money on awful food - We tried all trucks - won’t waste our time on poor service and food! Disappointing since we visited the same trucks  several years ago and it was awesome!

name: J T
text: This place is a fun interesting place especially for  families. Having the trailers there as food trucks gives your family a variety of choices. The entertainment is also great as there are games, music, etc. everywhere. Seating can be a little cramped at the busiest times. The ice cream shop and restaurant inside The Beach Club are decent as well.

name: Jennifer Hunley
text: Wish I could give it less than one star. It looks like an amazing concept. Poorly executed. Overpriced food that is not good. Don’t waste your time.

name: Scott Wylie
text: I hate giving negative reviews, but this was a one and done kind of place.  The live music was good but that's where it ended, ate at The Press and the customer service was terrible and the food wasn't any better.  Probably won't be back.

resp.text: One of the best things about The Beach Club is the secluded location, but the down-side of that is that it's hard to get employees way out here at the end of the island. We will try harder next year. We hope you'll return and give us another chance.

name: Kati Shelton
text: Food was great! Enjoyed all the activities on the lawn and the live music!

name: Richard Kilby
text: Great atmosphere, excellent yard games, but okay execution on the food.  The cheese on my $11 Patty Melt wasn't even melted!!  AC in the gift shop and a flush toilet.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing The Village Lawn on your recent visit. We value each guest, as we know that you have a choice when deciding where to dine while here in Gulf Shores. Excellent service and guest satisfaction are our most important priorities, and both are taken very seriously. We strive to exceed our guest expectations, and on behalf of all Spectrum staff I would like to sincerely apologize that we were not able to achieve this during your visit.

name: Greg Dodson
text: Great place for kids to have fun and get food from food trucks.

name: Tiffiney Busby
text: Great food and amazing staff. between movie on the lawn, live music and the activities. Definitely would recommend come out.

name: Melinda Green
text: Music pretty good. Food at Mexican was ok. Kids liked it but sandwiche place was really good. Overall, people nice just would like to have better food for price.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us at The Village Lawn. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit. We hope you visit again soon.

name: Dawn Myers
text: Rude staff, food was awful. Don’t waste your time or money.

name: Alex Sherman
text: Excellent community feel and the atmosphere is very family friendly .

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to dine with us at The Village Lawn. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your visit. We hope you visit again soon.

name: Christy Harrison
text: Loved going here. Good for a quick bite!

name: Ems mom
text: So much fun for everyone!

name: Zachary Shelton
text: Fun games & great food

name: Lawrence King
text: 25 plus minute wait for my wifes burrito, that was wrong when she got it. Other spots not any better staff is rude and indifferent. Overpriced and poor service.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing The Village Lawn on your recent visit. We value each guest, as we know that you have a choice when deciding where to dine while here in Gulf Shores. Excellent service and guest satisfaction are our most important priorities, and both are taken very seriously. We strive to exceed our guest expectations, and on behalf of all Spectrum staff I would like to sincerely apologize that we were not able to achieve this during your visit.

name: Firewalls911
text: Take kids because they have a lot for them to do.

text: The food was over priced for the amount you get. Paid more then enough and still left hungry and it doesn’t take much to fill me up.

text: Food took forever..not near enough seats for dining had to take food back with us so we overpaid for atmosphere we did not get to enjoy

We strive to exceed our guest expectations, and on behalf of all Spectrum staff I would like to sincerely apologize that we were not able to achieve this during your visit with us.

name: Austin Emerson
text: Great place for families

name: Carol Arnold
text: Always a lot of fun

name: Shane Pannell
text: Very expensive but plenty for the kids to do and good food live music great time for family dinner out side kinda picnicish
